# The `InlineAdvisorAnalysis` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

The <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlineadvisoranalysis">InlineAdvisorAnalysis</a> is a module pass because the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlineadvisor">InlineAdvisor</a> needs to capture state right before inlining commences over a module. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::InlineAdvisorAnalysis</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

The <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlineadvisoranalysis">InlineAdvisorAnalysis</a> is a module pass because the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlineadvisor">InlineAdvisor</a> needs to capture state right before inlining commences over a module.

Definition at line 307 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/inlineadvisor-h">InlineAdvisor.h</a>.
